name: Monger
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Left and Right arrow keys to open the doors on the castles.

Let in the merchants (the ones that don't look like knights). They come from the middle of the screen. 

DO NOT let in the knights. But as you let in the merchants, the knights will come out of your castle, so be careful.

THE STORY

The kings are away and they put you, their trusty arms dealer, in charge of both realms! You're a war monger, but you need to keep both kingdoms alive to keep your business booming.

Open the doors of the castle and let in the merchants. Be careful, though. The knights of the realm are always itching for a fight once those doors are open...

How long can YOU rule?

External Links

Web Player: http://scapesjam2022-monger.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/

Source Code: https://github.com/scaperoth/Monger2D

SEVERIN BACLET Tasty Characters - Castle Pack
